{docbook}
<abstract>
 <para>This chapter provides you with the basic knowledge of overridden components, internal APIs implemented in Knowledge. Also,
you will know how to set up a default template for the FAQ portlet, and how to create a sample action extension in Wiki.</para>
<para>In this chapter, there are the following main topics:</para>
    <itemizedlist>
      <listitem>
        <para>
          <emphasis role="bold">
            <link linkend="KSref.DeveloperReference.ExtensionPoints">Extension points</link>
          </emphasis> </para>
          <para>Knowledge about some overridable components in Knowledge.</para>
      </listitem>
      <listitem>
        <para>
          <emphasis role="bold">
            <link linkend="KSref.DeveloperReference.InternalAPI">Internal API</link>
          </emphasis> </para>
          <para>Description of REST Services of internal APIs, used to communicate with the server by the applications of Knowledge. </para>
      </listitem>
      <listitem>
        <para>
          <emphasis role="bold">
            <link linkend="KSref.DeveloperReference.FAQTemplateConfiguration">FAQ Template Configuration</link>
          </emphasis> </para>
          <para>Information on how to configure the FQA template, how to change its look and feel and APIs provided by the UIComponent. </para>
      </listitem>
      <listitem>
        <para>
          <emphasis role="bold">
            <link linkend="KSref.DeveloperReference.Extend_actions_over_a_wiki_page_from_external_jars">Extend actions over a wiki page from external jars</link>
          </emphasis> </para>
          <para>Instruction on how to add your own actions packaged in external jars to Wiki toolbar. </para>
      </listitem>
       <listitem>
        <para>
          <emphasis role="bold">
            <link linkend="KSref.JCRStructure">JCR structure</link>
          </emphasis> </para>
          <para>Description of the JCR structure of the main applications in Knowledge. </para>
      </listitem>
    </itemizedlist>
	</abstract>
{docbook}
